title: AB de Royse777
author: AB de Royse777
content: I need a (few) graphic designers, not professional designers but people who know basics including:1. How to take screenshots2. Watermark logo3. Follow guideline that will be provided to edit the images4. Know how to convert jpg/png to webp format.5. Can work alone and have common sense of making which screenshots to take and edit the screenshots with best possible value.It's a perfect job for anyone who knows canva.com or similar online tools.You will be provided a full guideline to follow with canva templates. Your job is to take screenshot > set the image in canva template > download > resize if needed > compress image > convert from jpg/png to webp > repeat . A set of work will take maximum 15 minutes once you are trained and become fluent of the workflow.Each set will require maximum 14 images to edit/resize etc.For each set you will be given $1There will be over 4000 sets to work which means you are looking at a regular freelancing work. This is a perfect job for beginners, I am not looking for a (few) professional/s by any means. Apply with your btc address and telegram url. I need forum members only. Not anyone outsider.Then contact me on https://t.me/Royse777 with the link of the post you made. I may ask for a forum PM to send, in case I need to verify you.
